Amber Heard's bid for a retrial in her legal battle with Johnny Depp has been denied.
The actress claimed one of the jurors had not been properly vetted, so the defamation trial should be re-run.

articles.title: Sopranos star Tony Sirico's funeral mass held in Brooklyn with Lorraine Bracco and Steven Van Zandt - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tony Sirico, who played Paulie on The Sopranos, had his funeral mass in Brooklyn on Wednesday. His brother Father Robert Sirico led, with Steven Van Zandt and Lorraine Bracco in attendance.
articles.content:
It was the series that remade TV - scooping dozens of awards and making stars out of its cast along the way.

articles.title: Rubettes singer Alan Williams wins High Court battle with other members over who owns group's name - Daily Mail
articles.description: Judge Pat Treacy made the ruling today after the singer and songwriter, and a company he runs, had sued Mick Clarke, John Richardson and Steve Innes Etherington.
articles.content:

articles.author: Samantha Bergeson
articles.title: Natalie Portman: Chris Hemsworth Went Without Meat for ‘Thor: Love and Thunder’ Kiss Since I’m Vegan - IndieWire
articles.description: "He eats meat like every half hour," Portman said of Hemsworth's dietary sacrifice to respect her diet. "Like, that was so thoughtful."
articles.content:
Natalie Portman didn’t have any beef with Chris Hemsworth over respecting her vegan diet.
